content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/numba/numba.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository to the container
COPY . /app/

# Install dependencies
RUN pip install -e .

# Run the test suite to verify the installation
RUN python runtests.py

vm_control.OutOfStorage: 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 294, in test_dockerfile
    success = self.build_project(repo_dir=repo_dir, logs=logs or self.logs)
  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 160, in build_project
    raise OutOfStorage()
vm_control.OutOfStorage

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/eval/eval.py", line 114, in eval_build_project
    build_status, n_tries = agent.repair_dockerfile(
  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/doc_test/agent/repair_agent.py", line 73, in repair_dockerfile

  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 335, in test_dockerfile
    return vmc.test_dockerfile(url, dockerfile_path, ref=ref)
  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 301, in test_dockerfile
    success = self.build_project(repo_dir=repo_dir, logs=logs or self.logs)
  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 160, in build_project
    raise OutOfStorage()
